ONE [KIMBER]56-kimber No matter how plump , plain , or poor [a woman]247-a woman is , the right wedding gown will make [her]247-a woman feel more beautiful than [any fairy - tale princess]248-any fairy - tale princess . Things are getting a bit heavy downstairs . ”[58-jenner] Delighted , [I]0-i laugh . “ [You]0-i always were [a slut]2179-a slut for French lace . ”[0-i] [He]58-jenner waves a hand in the air , imperious as [the queen]250-the queen . “ Twirl , [darling]2180-darling . SEVENTEEN [I]0-i ’m [the first one out of [the limo]1111-the limo]1159-the first one out of the limo because [I]0-i launch [myself]0-i from it like a rocket . ABOUT [THE AUTHOR

J.T. Geissinger]53-j.t. geissinger writes unique , passionate love stories for [readers who need more than cookie - cutter romance]2172-readers who need more than cookie - cutter romance . Ranging from funny , feisty rom - coms to intense , edgy suspense , [her]2173-her books have sold more than one million copies and been translated into several languages . [She]2173-her is the recipient of the Prism Award for Best First Book and the Golden Quill Award for Best Paranormal / Urban Fantasy and is a two - time finalist for the RITA Award from [the Romance Writers of [America]24-america]2174-the romance writers of america . [She]2173-her has also been a finalist in the Booksellers ’ Best , National Readers ’ Choice , and Daphne du Maurier Awards . Join [[her]2173-her Facebook readers ’ group — [[Geissinger]53-j.t. geissinger ’s Gang]2176-geissinger ’s gang]2175-her facebook readers ’ group — geissinger ’s gang — to take part in weekly Wine Wednesday live chats and giveaways , find out more information about works in progress , gain access to exclusive excerpts and contests , and get advance reader copies of [her]2173-her upcoming releases . [You]2167-you can also check out [her]2173-her website , www.jtgeissinger.com , or follow [her]2173-her on Instagram @JTGeissingerauthor and on Twitter @JTGeissinger .
